core.video

Class WebcamRunnable

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.Observable
      • core.video.WebcamRunnable
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class WebcamRunnable
extends java.util.Observable
implements java.lang.Runnable
    Searches for attached webcams and starts fetching images from up to 2 webcams the images are fed into the videopipeline for the Occulus. The Webcams are fetched with openCV and for better synchronization we use grab() first and then the slower retrieve() method.
